A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Spoilers\, if your a fan of Star Wars then it’s a big FU to the fan. A lot of plot holes in the movie. Like why keep Poe out of the loop? WW2 bombs that defy gravity\, a slow high speed chance with space ships\, a Luke shywalker battle that actually didn’t happen\, build up couple characters and then do nothing with them for example snoke and captain phasma.
